message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7500.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6500. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $6500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $7000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can offer $6800. That's my final offer, let me know if you can meet me there.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $7200. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I can offer $6900, that's the best I can do. Please let me know if you can meet me there.
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $7100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm really close to my budget, and I'm not sure if I can go any higher. I can offer $7000, that's my absolute limit. Please let me know if you can meet me there.

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original price and your offer. I'll offer it to you for $7300. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
